sentences.sentence: Normal cells, on the other hand, are the sanest things in the world.
sentences.translation: 正常的小屋，另一方面，事情在世界上。

sentences.sentence: Midsize sedans are clearly the sanest choice in this increasingly insane world.
sentences.translation: 中型轿车显然是这个越来越疯狂的世界中最理性的选择。

sentences.sentence: In order to increase economic efficiency, the software of the practical foreign company of enterprises is the sanest.
sentences.translation: 为了提高经济效益，企业实用国外公司的软件最稳健。
